notes: Interval fund with PE-style incentive fee waterfall including catch-up mechanism

fund_type.source_quote: The Fund is a closed-end interval fund

share_classes.share_classes.source_quote: The minimum initial investment in the Fund by any investor will be $2,500 with respect to Class S Shares and Class U Shares, and $250,000 with respect to Class I Shares. The minimum additional investment in the Fund by any investor will be $500
share_classes.share_classes.notes: Fund states explicit minimums, though may be reduced at Fund's discretion for certain investors

incentive_fee.has_incentive_fee.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection
incentive_fee.has_incentive_fee.source_quote: 10% of all Pre-Incentive Fee Net Investment Income Returns

incentive_fee.incentive_fee_pct.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection
incentive_fee.incentive_fee_pct.source_quote: 10% of all Pre-Incentive Fee Net Investment Income Returns...hurdle rate of 1.50% per quarter (6.00% annualized)

incentive_fee.hurdle_rate_pct.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection
incentive_fee.hurdle_rate_pct.source_quote: hurdle rate of 1.50% per quarter (6.00% annualized)

incentive_fee.hurdle_rate_as_stated.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection
incentive_fee.hurdle_rate_as_stated.notes: Raw quarterly hurdle rate before annualization

incentive_fee.hurdle_rate_frequency.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection

incentive_fee.high_water_mark.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection
incentive_fee.high_water_mark.notes: No high water mark - uses catch-up mechanism instead

incentive_fee.has_catch_up.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection
incentive_fee.has_catch_up.source_quote: The 'catch-up' is meant to provide the Adviser with approximately 10% of the Fund's Pre-Incentive Fee Net Investment Income Returns as if a hurdle rate did not apply if this net investment income exceeds 1.667% in any calendar quarter

incentive_fee.catch_up_rate_pct.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection

incentive_fee.catch_up_ceiling_pct.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection
incentive_fee.catch_up_ceiling_pct.source_quote: if this net investment income exceeds 1.667% in any calendar quarter

incentive_fee.fee_basis.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection
incentive_fee.fee_basis.source_quote: Pre-Incentive Fee Net Investment Income Returns

incentive_fee.crystallization_frequency.source_section: THE ADVISER section, Incentive Fee subsection

expense_cap.has_expense_cap.source_quote: Specified Expenses for each class of Shares do not exceed 0.50% of the average daily net assets

repurchase_terms.repurchase_frequency.source_quote: quarterly repurchase offers for between 5% and 25% of the Fund's outstanding Shares

repurchase_terms.repurchase_percentage_m.source_quote: repurchase only the minimum amount of 5%

repurchase_terms.lock_up_period_years.source_quote: Prior to one-year anniversary of acquisition

leverage_limits.uses_leverage.source_quote: asset coverage (as defined in the 1940 Act) of 300% or more (for leverage obtained through debt)

leverage_limits.max_leverage_pct.notes: 300% asset coverage = 33% leverage (normalized to % of assets that can be borrowed)

distribution_terms.distribution_frequenc.source_quote: The Fund intends to declare income distributions daily and distribute them to shareholders monthly

distribution_terms.default_distribution_.source_quote: Unless a Shareholder elects otherwise, the Shareholder will be deemed to have elected to have all distributions reinvested

allocation_targets.secondary_funds_min_p.notes: Direct investment fund, not fund-of-funds with allocation targets

allocation_targets.secondary_funds_max_p.notes: Direct investment fund, not fund-of-funds with allocation targets
